com.topcoder.configuration
Class ConfigurationException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          com.topcoder.util.errorhandling.BaseException
              com.topcoder.configuration.ConfigurationException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConfigurationAccessException, InvalidConfigurationException, ProcessException
public class ConfigurationException
extends com.topcoder.util.errorhandling.BaseException

This class is the base exception of this component. It provides user the supports for dealing with all the exceptions from this component as a whole.

Currently, there are three extensions of this exception, ProcessException, ConfigurationAccessException and InvlaidConfigurationException.

Thread safe: This class is thread safe since it is immutable.

Version:
1.0
Author:
maone, TCSDEVELOPER
See Also:
